comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:6.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0 Iceweasel/6.0
Build ID: 20110820100610

Steps to reproduce:

Drag an image from a website and drop on an application that accepts drops.


Actual results:

On Linux (X11) the event does not contain image mime data (image/*).
Firefox running on Windows has this data available!

Only text/uri-list is defined and contains image URL.


Expected results:

Image data mime type should be defined and contain raw image data in it's original format (image/png, image/jpeg, etc.)

Chrome provides such data properly on Linux.
comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:6.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0 Iceweasel/6.0
Build ID: 20110820100610

Steps to reproduce:

Drag an image from a website and drop on an application that accepts drops.


Actual results:

On Linux (X11) the event does not contain image mime data (image/*).
Firefox running on Windows has this data available!

Only text/uri-list is defined and contains image URL.


Expected results:

Image data mime type should be defined and contain raw image data in it's original format (image/png, image/jpeg, etc.)

Chrome provides such data properly on Linux.
